import React from 'react' import { Link, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Home() { let navigate = useNavigate() function NavigateFilter(e,value){ e.preventDefault() navigate(`/home/Tags/${value}`,{Filter:value}) } return ( <>

Welcome name

Related Tags : {NavigateFilter(e,e.target.textContent)}}>Shooter {NavigateFilter(e,e.target.textContent)}}>Action {NavigateFilter(e,e.target.textContent)}}>RPG {NavigateFilter(e,e.target.textContent)}}>Puzzle {navigate('/home')}}>Remove Tags
) }
